When I bought this game I truly believed it would be a fun experience, but after playing with recent updates I have unfortunately been globally muted.  Apparently there are no longer any aspects of freedom of speech in this game and it is very disappointing to me.  This game used to bring a great amount of joy to my friends and I, but I no longer receive the same amount of enjoyment out of this due to the newly added censorship.  The snowflakes and rejects of society have yet again ruined something enjoyable for the vast majority.  I will no longer and never plan on recommending this game to friends ever again.
